name: Estimate Cell Cycle Phase Durations
description: Estimate cell cycle phase durations using dual-nucleoside pulse labeling data and mathematical modeling

params.name: flow_cytometry_data_json
params.description: Flow cytometry data with EdU and BrdU labeling (JSON object with keys: time_points, edu_positive, brdu_positive, double_positive)

params.name: initial_estimates_json
params.description: Initial estimates for cell cycle phases (JSON object with keys: g1_duration, s_duration, g2m_duration, death_rate)
